unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent! We at Tata Consultancy Services have a robust program, visiting IIT Delhi on 10/10/2024 for initial screening. Expect results by 25/10/2024. Reminds me of my own campus placement at IIM Lucknow back in '98. Good luck to all aspirants! Interviews typically start at 09:00 hrs.
